DOC.criteria: Healthy term infant , gestational age include 37 week 42 week . Healthy define `` supervision medical treatment medical specialist . Further determined HCP . Birth weight 2.5 4.5 KG ( within normal range gestational age sex ) Infants 6 week postnatal age ( Including day 42 ) Receiving exclusively least 1 complete infant formula feed per day study inclusion ( retrospectively exclusively partly formula feed ) Willingness change regular infant formula study product Parents ' legal guardian ' age include 18 year , write , informed consent . Infants congenital condition / previous current illness ( ) medication could interfere study Infants establish suspected cow milk allergy , lactose intolerance , galactosaemia infant prescribe fibre free ( e.g . prebiotic oligosaccharide ) diet Participation study involve investigational market product concomitantly within 2 week prior entry study Investigator 's uncertainty willingness parent / legal guardian comply protocol requirement .
